title: [Antiquarian Manor, Showroom]
[Antiquarian Manor, Show Room]
description: Frosted globes dangle over each of the glass display cases housed in the small show room, while plush carpets muffle the sound in the enclosed space.  Golden fleur-de-lis decorate the cloth-of-gold fabric that decorates the walls, the symbol echoed in the ornate feet of velveteen chairs arranged in the corners.  A heavy white door offers egress.
